buildCommand: node scripts/switch-schema-auto.js && npx prisma generate && if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL_NON_POOLING" ] && [ -z "$DIRECT_URL" ]; then export DIRECT_URL="$DATABASE_URL_NON_POOLING"; fi; if [ -n "$DIRECT_URL" ] && [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then npx prisma migrate deploy; else echo 'Skipping prisma migrate deploy: require DATABASE_URL and DIRECT_URL (or DATABASE_URL_NON_POOLING)'; fi; next build
